definition: the act of populating  - causing to live in a place
details:
noun
- the act of populating - causing to live in a place
= example: the act of populating - causing to live in a place
- (statistics) the entire aggregation of items from which samples can be drawn
= example: (statistics) the entire aggregation of items from which samples can be drawn
= synonyms: universe
- a group of organisms of the same species inhabiting a given area
= example: a group of organisms of the same species inhabiting a given area
- the people who inhabit a territory or state
= example: the people who inhabit a territory or state
- the number of inhabitants (either the total number or the number of a particular race or class) in a given place (country or city etc.)
= example: the number of inhabitants (either the total number or the number of a particular race or class) in a given place (country or city etc.)
